english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
We hung out at the shopping mall yesterday evening.
I like to sit in a coffee shop and read the newspaper before I go to work.
transliteration: baɧíbb ʔáʔ3ud fi -lʔáhwa wi ʔáʔra -lgurnān ʔablə ma -rūɧ iššúɣl.
arabic: بحِبّ أقْعُد في القهْوَة و أقْرا الجُرْنان قبْل ما أروح الشُّغْل.

english: Have you ever been on TV?

arabic: أيْه أكْتر بِرْنامِج بِتْحِبُّه في التِّليڤِزْيوْن؟

english: What do you like to watch on TV?
arabic: بِتْحِبّ تِتْفرّج على أيْه في التِّليڤِزْيوْن؟

english: I haven’t seen the second season of this show yet.
transliteration: ʔána líssa ma-šúftiš ilmūsim ittāni min ilmusálsal da.
arabic: أنا لِسّه مشُفْتِش الموسِم التّاني مِن المسلْسل ده.

english: There’s an interesting program on channel 3.
arabic: فيه بِرْنامِج حِلْو على القناهْ التّالْتة.

english: I can’t hear what they’re saying. Could you turn the TV up a bit?
transliteration: ʔána miš sāmi3 biyʔūlu ʔē. múmkin ti3álli -ttilivizyōn šuwáyya?
arabic: أنا مِش سامِع بِيْقولوا أيْه.  مُمْكِن تِعلّي التِّليڤِزْيوْن شُوَيَّة؟

english: I’m trying to study. Could you turn the TV down a bit?
arabic: بحاوِل أذاكِر.  مُمْكِن تِوَطّي التِّليڤِزْيوْن شُوَيَّة؟

english: to forward, skip to the next track
to rewind, go back to (the previous track)
Excuse me. Would you take a photo of us?
Let’s go to the cinema this weekend.
A new movie is coming out on Friday. Want to go?
transliteration: fī filmə gdīd ha-yínzil yōm ilgúm3a. tiɧíbbə nrūɧ?
arabic: فيه فيلْم جِديد هَيِنْزِل يوْم الجُمْعة.  تِحِبّ نِروح؟

english: They’re showing a classic movie this evening.
to sit close to the screen
I don’t like to sit too close to the screen.
transliteration: ma-baɧíbbiš ʔáʔ3ud ʔuráyyib ʔáwi min iššāša.
arabic: مبحِبِّش أقْعُد قُريِّب أَوي مِن الشّاشة.

english: What kind of movies do you like?
I love action movies, but I can’t stand romantic movies.
transliteration: ʔána baɧíbb ʔaflām ilʔ[action], bassə miš baʈīʔ ilʔaflām irrumansíyya.
arabic: أنا بحِبّ أفْلام الأكْشِن، بسّ مِش بطيق الأفْلام الرّومانْسية.

english: No, thank you. I don’t smoke.
